text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu La Yahillu Lakum 'An Tarithu An-Nisa' Karhaan Wa La Ta`đuluhunna Litadh/habu Biba`đi Ma 'Ataytumuhunna 'Illa 'An Ya'tina Bifahishatin Mubayyinatin Wa `Ashiruhunna Bil-Ma`rufi Fa'in Karihtumuhunna Fa`asa 'An Takrahu Shay'aan Wa Yaj`ala Allahu Fihi Khayraan Kathiraan
